name: Rock-a-Bye Baby!
description:
Rock-a-Bye Baby is a game that was made in the span of just one week! The theme of this game jam was "Accessibility" and the whole game is play-able using just one button.

- Use the space bar to navigate the game - tap to move and hold down to select in the menu!

- Normal babies are 50 points, golden babies are worth 300 points

- Avoid dirty diapers! No one wants a stork to deliver those.

- Pacifiers will grant you an extra life!

- Compete with your friends to see who can get the highest score! No leaderboard, no glory.
